topic.title: 10 step conspiracy theory
topic.body:
1. cut comms & black out 75m+ people (more than the entire population of germany or the uk)
2. people now unable to talk with each other or others -> get more and more enraged by the day
3. wait until some crazy eventually starts shooting or blow up something
4. extra: set up some of the crazies to shot biden at the inauguration ceremony(!)
5. kamala immediately takes over (she might orchestrated just as medieval aristocrats poisoned each other)
6. first (completely unelected) woman president of the US + under full corporate control
7. immediately start confiscating guns, as a retorsion for 3 + 4
8. once guns are collected, there is nothing in the way to completely eliminate the first amendment
9. end of free speech
10. full totalitarian control with global surveillance

topic.title: Neoliberal Totalitarianism
topic.body:
"The 20th Century gave us the right-wing totalitarianism of the Nazis and the left-wing totalitarianism of the Communists. The trauma caused by these ideologies caused people to gravitate towards the centre, in the belief that this was the opposite of totalitarianism. But the 21st Century has given us a new, centrist form of totalitarianism: the neoliberal form."

http://vjmpublishing.nz/?p=25059

topic.title: The One Commandment of Social Media
topic.body:
"You have the right to remain absent from social media.
Anything you say can and will be used against you in future courts."

1610273837_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
Con:

- Kamala takes the throne - one way, or another (pushing Biden out of the way if necessary) -> First (100% unelected) woman president of the US.
- More corporate surveillance, more corporate censorship
- More ideological subversion (left, far-left, neocommunist ideologies, erasing genders, families, etc)

Pro:

- Decentralized networks are going mainstream
- Normies go decentralized
- Trust in Old (pre 2021) Big Tech will continue to plummet
- Crypto will rise
